about.intro: I'm a full stack software developer and a student at heart: whether it be a book, an interesting article, or a difficult problem, I like to get lost in the things I do.
about.introSecondary: I had the pleasures of working for a start-up and a medium sized corporation to support their early stages of structuring and their web product for their clients.
